column2: "Nda enum ekyir no
column3: ɔsɔfopanyin Ananias nye mpanyimfo no binom nye mbranyimnyi bi a wɔfrɛ no Tertulus sianee bae
column4: na hɔn na wɔbɔbɔɔ Paul ho nkuro kyerɛɛ ambrado no."

column2: "Na wɔfrɛɛ no no
column3: Tertulus hyɛɛ ase bɔɔ nkuro dɛ: Ɔnam dɛ yɛnam wo do enya asomdwee pii
column4: nye ɔmansesɛw a ɔnam wo nyimdzee do baa man yi mu
column7: yinom nyina yɛdze ndaase nyina gye daa wɔ mbea nyina."

column2: "Na meremma asɛm no nnwar pii ntsi
column3: meserɛ wo fa w'adom tsie hɛn kakra."

column2: "Na yeehu ɔbarimba yi dɛ ɔyɛ obusuyɛfo
column3: na ɔdze mansotwe ba Jewfo nyina mu wɔ wiadze nyina
column4: na ɔyɛ Nazarene fɛkuw no mu ɔkandzifo;"

column2: "na ɔsɔe hwɛe so dɛ ɔdze fi bɛka asɔrfi no: ɔno na yɛkɛkyeer no:"
"[na nkyɛ yɛpɛɛ dɛ yɛnam hɛn mbra no do bu no atsɛn; na safohen panyin Lisias baa hɛn do
column3: na ɔdze enyimpi bohwiim no wɔ hɛn nsamu kɔree
column4: na ɔhyɛɛ n'atoafo dɛ wɔmbra wo hɔ;]"
column5: "#24.7 Tsetse akyerɛwfo no bi mmfa nkyekyɛmu esuon yi nnka ho."

column2: "na woara so ehwehwɛ mu a
column3: ibotum ehu dza osian ntsi a yɛnye no robɔ nkuro nyina."

column2: "Na Jewfo no so foaa no do dɛ nsɛm no nyina tse dɛm."
"Na ambrado no too Paul nsa dɛ ɔnkasa no
column3: Paul buaa dɛ: Susuampa dɛ minyim dɛ ifitsii eyɛɛ ɔman yi tsɛmbuafo edzi mfe pii ntsi

column2: "na ibotum ehu dɛ ɔmmbor dadu ndaebien na mokɔr Jerusalɛm dɛ morokɔsɔr;"
"na woennhu me asɔrfi mu anaa nhyiamudan mu anaa kurow mu hɔ
column3: dɛ menye bi rekasa anaadɛ meretan nyimpadodow enyi."

column2: "Eso worunntum nnkyerɛ ndzɛmba a wɔrotoatoa m'ano wɔ ho yi."
"Na iyi dze
column3: mepaa mu meka kyerɛ wo dɛ
column4: Ɔkwan a wɔfrɛ no Fɛkuw no mu na mosom m'egyanom Nyankopɔn
column5: dɛ megye ndzɛmba a wɔakyerɛw wɔ mbra no nye nkɔnhyɛfo no mu midzi;"

column2: "na mowɔ Nyankopɔn ho enyidado a hɔnara so hwɛ no kwan no
column3: dɛ owusoɛr bi bɛba a hɔn a wɔtsen nye hɔn a wɔnntsen so bɔsoɛr."

column2: "Na iyi mu na mo so mobɔ bra dɛ mibenya tsibowa a ntotoananmu nnyi mu wɔ Nyankopɔn nye nyimpa afamu daa."
"Na mfe pii ekyir no
column3: mebaa dɛ medze ayɛyɛdze merebrɛ me man

column2: "na iyi mu na wohun me wɔ asɔrfi mu dɛ meguar moho
column3: eso menndze nyimpadodow anaa gyigyeegye bi; na Jewfo bi a wofi Asia
column5: "hɔn na ɔsɛ dɛ nkyɛ wɔba w'enyim
column6: sɛ wɔnye me wɔ asɛm bi a wɔnye me bɔbɔ nkuro."

column2: "Anaaso iyinom ara a wogyina ha yi nka dɛ
column3: migyinaa baguafo no enyim no
column4: wohun emumuyɛ bi wɔ mo ho"

column2: "ka asɛm kor yi ara a migyinaa hɔn mu no metseaa mu kaa dɛ
column3: Ewufosoɛr ntsi na worubu me atsɛn ndɛ yi."

column2: "Na Feliks nyim Ɔkwan no ho asɛm yie no ntsi
column3: ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom ntwentweɔn do kakra na sɛ safohen panyin Lisias ba a
column5: nna mibetsie asɛm no mu yie."

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ ɔhamupanyin no dɛ ɔmfa Paul nsie
column3: na ɔmma ondzi noho
column4: na mma onnsiw n'amanyimfo bi kwan dɛ wɔbɔsom no."

column2: "Na nda bi ekyir Feliks nye ne yer Drusila a ɔyɛ Jewnyi no bae
column3: na ɔsomae kɛfrɛɛ Paul
column4: na otsiee gyedzi a ɔwɔ Kraest Jesus mu ho asɛm."

column2: "Na ɔreka tsenenee
column3: nye enyidahɔ
column4: nye atsɛmbu a ɔreba ho asɛm no
column5: Feliks bɔɔ hu na obuaa dɛ
column6: Sesei dze kɔ; na minya ho adagyer a

column2: "Na n'enyi daa kwan so dɛ Paul bɛma no sika: dɛm ntsi daa ɔmaa wɔkɛfrɛɛ no
column3: na ɔnye no twetwee nkɔmbɔ."

column2: "Na mfe ebien durii no
column3: Porkius Festus bedzii Feliks ananmu; na Feliks pɛɛ dɛ ɔsɔ Jewfo enyi ntsi
